name: Bug-Off (Game Off 2021)
description:
An unsuspecting player has decided to play the game. The game is simple, traverse the level, pick up keys and open all the chests as ‘The Adventurer’. Sounds pretty fun. Little do they know that this game has many glitches, and you are The Bug in the game.

Created by Musashi117 and chinpenguin, with free art assets from Sharm, oglsdl, and drxwat

This was made for the Game Off 2021 jam. Source code for the game is available HERE
